name: Fall 2016 - 470 - Galactic Defenders
description:
All donations go directly to the Computer Graphics Club at Chico State, less a 10% donation to Itch.IO for hosting services

Play as a contractor to defend objectives. Kill and collect points to purchase items. Utilize equipment and weapons to prevent enemies from reaching their objective.

This tower defense game was developed on HTC Vive. Sci-fi is the theme of the game and the objective is to patrol and monitor different regions of the galaxy that needs defending.

System requirements for your game

  • Recommended
    • GPU: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 or AMD Radeon RX 480, equivalent or better.
    • CPU: Intel Core i5-4590 or AMD FX 8350, equivalent or better.
    • RAM: 4 GB or more.
    • Output: HDMI 1.4, DisplayPort 1.2 or newer.
    • USB: 1x USB 2.0 or better port.
    • OS: Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1 or later.
    • Storage: 120mb

Team Lagmaster Members

Daniel Olmos - Programmer

Daniel Baxter - Level Designer & 3D Artist

Alexander Stamatis - Project Lead & Animator
